General.Name: Shanghai International Port Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai International Port (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the operation and management of ports in China. The company distributes container terminals in Yangshan, Waigaoqiao, and Wusong. It also offers bulk cargo terminal services, including stevedoring of bulk cargo, general and special cargo, roll-on/roll-off for wheeled cargo, and cruise terminals; port logistic services; and Tugboat and cargo tallying services to the container, bulk and general cargo, and logistics industries. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Port Authority and changed its name to Shanghai International Port (Group) Co., Ltd. in 2003. Shanghai International Port (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Shanghai, China.
